result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Diego Flores Bernal in court.  Attorney Ashley L Renz in court for Diego Flores Bernal.  Prosecuting attorney Samuel Thomas Berg in court for the State of Wisconsin. Trial dates set. Minutes filed.
Final pre-trial scheduled for January 23, 2023 at 10:00 am.
Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for February 6, 2023 at 08:30 am.

Prosecuting attorney Andrew Herrmann in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Diego Flores Bernal in court.  Attorney Ashley L Renz in court for Diego Flores Bernal. Minutes filed.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Diego Flores Bernal in court.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court by JJ Crawford.  Attorney Ashley L Renz in court for Diego Flores Bernal. Called @ 3:20 p.m. Appearances made. Matter before the Court for 1st status. Record by Atty. Renz as to status, offer, and needs one more status so defendant can obtain residency in Walworth County. Court sets for additional status.
Status conference scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
EFFECTIVE DATE OF THIS ASSIGNMENT IS AUGUST 1, 2022.

Defendant Diego Flores Bernal in court.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court by JJ Crawford. Attorney James Duquette for Attorney Ashley L Renz in court for Diego Flores Bernal. Called @ 1:34 p.m. Appearances made. Matter before the Court for arraignment. Record by Atty. Duquette who waives further reading of Information and enters not guilty pleas on behalf of the defendant. Court in recess.
Status conference scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

2:06 PM - Defendant Diego Flores Bernal in court.  Attorney Ashley L Renz in court for Diego Flores Bernal.  Attorney Vivian TenHaken in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Matter was scheduled for a preliminary hearing but the defendant wishes to waive his right to a preliminary hearing.  Response by Counsel and defendant to Court's questions.  Court finds defendant freely, knowingly and voluntarily waives his right to a preliminary hearing and binds the defendant over. 

State is requesting two weeks for an Arraignment Hearing.

adj. 2:08 PM
Arraignment scheduled for April 22, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Diego Flores Bernal in court with Attorney Ashley Renz. JJ Crawford in court for the State of Wisconsin. Called @ 1:55 p.m. Appearances made. Matter before the Court for initial appearance. Viven TenHaken appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Diego Flores Bernal appeared in court with attorney Ashley Renz. State has not yet made charging decision, asking for 2 weeks. Minutes filed.
Hearing scheduled for April 1, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol. Defendant is not to enter any bars, taverns, or liquor stores. Defendant shall not drive a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. Defendant shall not possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.
